name: Robert_Mapplethorpe
text:
Robert Mapplethorpe
Robert Mapplethorpe was a photographer whose work was displayed in March 1989 at the County Museum in Twin Peaks, Washington.
Behind the scenes
Robert Mapplethorpe (November 4, 1946 – March 9, 1989) was an American photographer, known for his black and white photos that often featured controversial subject matter.
